channel.title: How do i add admin and mod?
channel.description: I downloaded a sever and it doesnt have mod or admin so how do i add them?

item.title: How do i add admin and mod?
item.dc:creator: @Encryptic Encryptic
item.description:
@Encryptic wrote:

[quote=“Kayceee, post:4, topic:427539”][quote author=thekingpin link=topic=530236.msg3871260#msg3871260 date=1325359559]
go

source/data/characters/(your char name)
then change character-rights = 0
to

[/quote]

0 = Normal player
1 = Mod
2 = Admin
3 = Owner

SOMETIMES:
4 = Hidden owner (Depends what source your using)[/quote]

4 can also equal Donator.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add admin and mod?

item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

[quote=“thekingpin, post:3, topic:427539”]go

source/data/characters/(your char name)
then change character-rights = 0
to

0 = Normal player
1 = Mod
2 = Admin
3 = Owner

SOMETIMES:
4 = Hidden owner (Depends what source your using)
